info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 3:46PM EST until December 26 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Light freezing rain expected. Additional ice accumulations less than a tenth of an inch. Light snow and light freezing drizzle will likely develop after midnight. * WHERE...Eastern Addison, eastern Rutland, Orange, and Windsor counties in Vermont. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions will continue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy road conditions will continue to exist tonight as most areas are experiencing temperatures at or below freezing. Additional light freezing rain is expected off and on through the night as well as some light snow and freezing drizzle during the overnight hours. These conditions will lead to difficult travel and visibilities will likely be reduced due to fog, which will further impact travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
